html:
** Shares of digital marketing software provider MRIN.O jump 35.4% to $4.7 after the bell

** MRIN announces integration with Amazon Ads' demand-side platform (DSP) to expand Amazon advertising solutions

** Co says integration will allow brands to easily manage, measure, and optimize their Amazon advertising campaigns

** Amazon DSP enables advertisers to reach audiences at scale across Amazon sites and apps as well as leading publisher sites and third-party exchanges

** MRIN in Sept. 2021 had entered into a revenue share agreement with Google GOOGL.O to develop its enterprise tech platform and software products (Full Story)

** Co, which joined the "meme stocks" club only in June, has seen its shares rise 70.8% YTD


(Reporting by Kannaki Deka in Bengaluru)

(( Kannaki.Deka@thomsonreuters.com ))
